column2: tampilkan jumlah purchase order selama 3 bulan terakhir
column3:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalPurchaseOrders
FROM PurchaseOrders
WHERE DateOfOrder >= DATEADD(MONTH, -3, GETDATE())

column2: tampilkan jumlah purchase order selama 3 bulan terakhir
column3:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalPurchaseOrders
FROM PurchaseOrders
WHERE DateOfOrder >= DATEADD(MONTH, -3, GETDATE())

column2: tampilkan permintaan purchase order selama 3 bulan terakhir
column3:
SELECT *
FROM PurchaseOrders
WHERE DateOfOrder >= DATEADD(MONTH, -3, GETDATE())

column2: barang apa yang paling sering di request selama 3 bulan terakhir
column3:
SELECT TOP 1 ProductId, COUNT(ProductId) AS TotalRequests
FROM PurchaseRequestDetails
WHERE CreatedDate >= DATEADD(MONTH, -3, GETDATE())
GROUP BY ProductId
ORDER BY COUNT(ProductId) DESC;

column2: berapa budget yang harus disiapkan per tahun agar tidak overbudget ataupun kekurangan budget. Status Approved yang digunakan adalah APPROVED
column3:
SELECT SUM(TotalAmount) AS TotalBudget
FROM PurchaseRequests
WHERE StatusId = 'APPROVED'
